STATE
v.
TALLEY. No. COA07-89. Court of Appeals of North Carolina. Filed November 20, 2007. Certification Date December 10, 2007. Appeal from Yadkin (03CRS2079, 03CRS2080, 03CRS2081, 03CRS2082, 03CRS2083, 03CRS2084, 03CRS2085, 03CRS2086, 03CRS2087, 03CRS2088, 03CRS2089, 03CRS2090, 03CRS2091, 03CRS2092, 03CRS2093, 03CRS2094, 03CRS2095, 03CRS2096, 03CRS2097, 03CRS2098).

Cases reported without published opinion. Affirmed and remanded for correction of clerical error.
